item.title: Trump administration to create a strategic reserve for rare earths elements
item.description: The Trump administration plans to deploy nearly $12 billion to create a strategic reserve of rare earth elements

item.title: Wall Street opens higher while gold and silver claw back losses
item.description: Wild swings that swept through financial markets overnight are calming a bit as Wall Street opens for trading

item.title: What to know after a deadly landslide in eastern Congo kills at least 200 miners
item.description: A landslide last week collapsed tunnels at a major coltan mining site in eastern Congo, leaving at least 200 people dead
